bio: Accidental resident of London's Silicon Roundabout, my background is that place where academia and technology collide ("BA, MA, PG Dip ODE (Open)" don't quite slip off the tongue).I help individuals and small organisations get started and get strategic with social media.I contribute to Groove Loves Melody in Dallas, TX, and under my Daddy or Chips? guise, I churn out house music mixes. Enda Guinan | Social Director
